Package game.actors.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, DropAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
ForestWatcher, SpawnableEnemy
public abstract class Enemy
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
implements DropAction
Represents the common functionality and characteristics of enemy actors within the game. The Enemy class extends Actor and implements methods that allow enemies to engage in combat, wander, and interact with the game world in various ways. Enemy actors can execute behaviors such as attacking and wandering. When an enemy is defeated, they can drop items in the game world.

  • Field Details

    • behaviours

      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Behaviour> behaviours
      A collection of behaviours that the enemy actor can exhibit. The behaviours are ordered based on their execution priority.
